TopicTitle: Need help rendering a KSP film

Articles.Content:
I wasn't sure where to put this since it's about KSP, but it's not directly related to KSP.

Anyway, I'm trying to render a short KSP film using Sony Vegas. All of the video types I have tried so far have turned out to be low quality.

I've tried rendering it as an .mp4, an .avi (works best so far) and currently trying .wmv

Does anyone know how to use sony vegas to render a higher quality video? So far the highest I have gotten to was like 480p.

Have you recorded in a high quality? If you want a good output you'll need at least 720p. Next up, when you're exporting/rendering, check the resolution. I sometimes render my films as 1440X1080p by accident and it squishes everything. And finally, are you recording at a reasonable framerate? 25+ is required for a fluid looking film. Pleasure to help. Good luck.
